Author: spookyrascal
Text: first of all this made me cackle. second of all some advice from someone who switched their major five (5) different times bc she was afraid to upset her parents by leaving a STEM field: switch now!!! if you’re interested in other things take a class in them next semester or talk to your advisor about your options. it seems like a huge deal, esp if u feel a lot of pressure to stay in that major, but once ur studying something ur interested in it’s sooo much easier and its best to start exploring earlier and give urself a shot at graduating on time. best of luck!
